website_summaries.verdict: The pricey Master & Dynamic MW07 Plus true wireless earphones offer solid audio and noise cancellation with style to spare.
pros: Strong audio performance with rich bass depth
Good ANC and ambient listening modes
cons: No app with EQ or ANC adjustments
No AAC Bluetooth codec support, just AptX/SBC

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding
customer_reviews.text: If it is quality sound you are after cannot recommend them more highly. Look good, good fit, good battery life and fantastic sound. Only downside is the noise cancellation, not great but personally, that does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Savage

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT fit!!! By far my favorite wireless
customer_reviews.text: After losing three pairs of Apple EarPods I decided to give these a go... I thought I would take better care of them more as they seemed prettier and like I’d want to take good care of them. I am SO impressed. The sound quality, never have problems with the microphone (I’m on conference calls a lot of the day), battery has never been an issue and have had zero connection problems (iPhone XR). What surprised me most is the fit of these! They are extremely comfortable, I often forget they are in my ears and they NEVER fall out like my apple ones did (RIP EarPod #3 to subway track). Going to take very good care of these babies.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Really good. Take the time to set them up properly.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really really good. Takes sometime to burn In but once they do the sound is natural and not lacking in Bass. Source material is important. So dont listen to badly engineered songs then blame the earphones. These aren’t going to hide flaws like lesser headphones can do. Also fit in your ears directly effects the tonal balance. So take time to find the right wings and tips for your ears. The sound should be natural and a little warm with taught bass. Take the time to set them up properly before you judge. Took a couple listening sessions and adjustments for me to get that wow moment.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome!! Really amazing sound quality and very easy Bluetooth pairing for fantastic and simplistic listening on the go. The headphones came with a few different sized ear attachments so I was able to find the perfect and most comfortable fit to my ears. This allowed for remarkable noise cancelling properties and they didn’t budge even during aggressive workouts. Long lasting battery life and really easy indicators to show when they need a charge. Overall they are far superior to similar products and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is Long-lasting but sacrificing Quality of Active Noise Canceling, and No-app Support
customer_reviews.text: The product's battery life is insane which up to 40+ hours with ANC no, but sound quality is great when loud, but it might become sallow when at Ear-safe volume. Indeed, ANC is not effective to block out noise come from a two-person conversation when your volume is set below 50, and 70 becomes loud, although ambient noise is functional , yet, there is no App to customize any settings, which is a stand-alone product with no sound customizations or update.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Flat out fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Killer fit, no problems with Blue tooth range, great fitting options. I added COMPLY foam tips as I do with all my ear buds for the perfect seal and final touch. In ear buds I own: Apple AirPods, AirPod Pro, PowerBeats, Bose, Jabra and UE Custom. These are at the top. Buy 'em!
customer_reviews.author: RJP858

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: There not cheap but worth every dime. Great sound, as custom a fit as you can ask for with all the fins and accessories, great battery life and again, that wonderful M&D sound. If you want music and not midrange noise in your ear, grab these buds and then enjoy them all day. long
customer_reviews.author: Mark McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous frequency response
customer_reviews.text: Took several tries to get all the fit options figured out. I've worn them for 6 hours playing music continously. Wonderful frequency response. Bass is easily heard as is the highest synthesizer note. They have a few issues - noise canceling is minimum which actually extends battery life. I'll take the extra battery life. Each bud controls different things which confuses some people. All earbuds have trade offs. Too many people complain about the trade offs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing.  Independent Right/Left operation.  Great Sount.
customer_reviews.text: I think I have purchased 5 or 6 pairs of earbuds over the last few years, these are the best. Worth every penny. Sound quality is better then Samsung, Jabra, B&O, and any of the cheep under $50.00 earbuds that I use for outside work. I often have the left one in use for music or audio books for 7 or 8 hours at a stretch. Very comfortable after some trial and error looking for the right combination of tip and wing.... I love these and I have used them every day since they arived.
customer_reviews.author: Glen G.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is wonderful. They fit super comfortably and snug once I changed the fins and buds to the largest sizes. Although the the noise cancelling is basically non existent, the overall quality of the headphones compensate. Would recommend to anyone looking for premium wireless Bluetooth buds.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Audio, Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after researching around and am extremely happy with my decision. The noise cancellation is great and I feel submersed in whatever I am consuming - audio books, streaming videos, Spotify, etc. The case is awesome and the battery holds charge for a very very long time. The design is easy to carry around and the ear pieces fit comfortably in my ears (other brands have not fit as well or hurt after a while). These are easily the best headphones I have ever purchased. 5 Stars - Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for working out and using in coffee shops or places where my over ear headphones aren’t convenient. These have great sound, look nice (though it took me a while to get used to the unique shape without feeling self conscious in public, even though AirPods are worn by tons of people with no apparent similar qualms), have incredible battery life, and are easy to control with physical buttons for volume, noise cancellation, track pausing and skipping. I don’t really use the ambient sound feature much if at all, but I do use the noise cancellation feature. It’s not great, but in certain surroundings it is a noticeable improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: These are a luxurious joke
customer_reviews.text: The audacity that this company has to price these pieces of garbage for $300 is obsurd! I wasted my money with these. Ambient mode barely works as it sounds. Noise cancellation is also terrible and doesn’t cut out enough noise. Worst buy of 2020. Buy airpod pros for a better use of your money and music
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The Master and Dynamic MW07 Plus are amazing sounding. The design is also very nice and doesn't protrude too far from your ears. The active noise cancellation is decent. It isn't as good as the Sony WF-1000XM3's. Two reasons for only giving 4 stars. They are very expensive and I am having an issue with audio and visual syncing up on my Pixel 2 XL. My Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge doesn't have this problem though when I am using them. As a result I think this is due to the phone and headphones, but still kind of annoying. Great headphones overall!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Linton

customer_reviews.title: Fit the ear tip first thing!
customer_reviews.text: They come with the medium ear tip installed. So I took my usual 6 mile walk and felt they sounded better than my old buds, but not worth the price paid. So when I swapped out the medium to small, they still sounded a bit tinny. Installed the large ear tips, a world of difference, much more full sound and increased bass. Very happy with my choose.
customer_reviews.author: Gene B.

customer_reviews.title: Best true wireless out there
customer_reviews.text: I had been waiting for months for Bose to release their new true wireless noise cancelling earbuds and they are still not released. I did allot of research and purchased these based on a few forum articles I had read. These are comfortable, stylish, noise cancelling is great and sound is really good. I use these while travelling and for conference calls. Great not having cords and a mic in your face on conference calls and small package to carry with you while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but very high quality. Battery life and case is tops. I like the look, but the comfort of it in my ear is what matters; it wins there, too. Could use more bass, but sound is great and I can’t hear a dang thing when they’re in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be even better
customer_reviews.text: One very important thing is that the two buds disconnected from each other often and that was quite annoying I did expect a little bit better quality on the sound. Call quality in coming was perfect out going was not so perfect some people said I was a little muffled some said it was okay and some said I sounded like I was very far away in a tunnel. Too much money to spend on disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: DG57

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I usually find earbuds irritating but these are SO comfortable I can barely feel them, even after several hours. I got the white and love the way they look. The sound is amazing, battery life lasts for ages, and the charging case is small and feels nice to hold - classy. Really happy I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Jana R

customer_reviews.title: Stellar sound, non-existing ANC
customer_reviews.text: I truly enjoy how these sound. Very neutral but not lack in enjoyment. These are some of the most impressive earbuds that you can find. I had continential flight recently and the ANC is just disappointing. It bearly do anything with the noise. I had to use the Bose NC700 and it is night and day. Even the passive noise isolation is not great compared to everything else. Battery life is so great you would not have to worry about it. Just amazing
customer_reviews.author: Phong N.

customer_reviews.title: Yaaaassss!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Excellent sound, easy to set up, and the earphones can be used one at a time. The fit is great without hurting my ear or having ear “fatigue”. Highly recommended. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Beat service ever
customer_reviews.text: Turns out i cant wear earbuds but they he customer service was fabolous even in these difficult times
customer_reviews.author: Susan Korski

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, battery life, and comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love these earphones! I have only had them a short while, but they are comfortable to wear and have great sound. I have not had them long enough to get a good idea how well the noise cancellation mode works, but the ambient mode works well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pure Class
customer_reviews.text: This is really the only kind of wireless earbud I'd consider using. All high end earbuds cost a couple hundred dollars but in all honesty these are the only ones that justify the price. A really nice alternative to my M&D headphones when I'm on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Best noise canceling earphones on the market ... I’ve researched for a while.... these are the best for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mucciolo

customer_reviews.title: Better than AiRPod Pros
customer_reviews.text: AmaZing I use them everyday great for workouts and tons of fittings highly recommend , wayyyy better than the AirPod Pros
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these wireless in-ear earphones! The only thing I wish was better is the noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jared T Hiles

customer_reviews.title: Only one device at a time
customer_reviews.text: Despite what the specifications say, these can only be paired to one device at a time. You have to manually switch between them by putting the headphones into pairing mode.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip St. James

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to pair, clumsy fit with little in the way of noise cancellation. Decent sound, but waaay too big.
customer_reviews.author: NFL Films fan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome. I really love them. Good quality. Calls sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bartkowski

customer_reviews.title: valuable
customer_reviews.text: everything was as expected, personally a bit difficult to find the right fit with the rubber seal.
customer_reviews.author: mingus65

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality, premium sound.
customer_reviews.text: Premium IEMs. I love these. I have a number of True Wireless devices including Sony WF-1000, Jabra Elite 65t,Sennheiser True Wireless and Apple Airpod Pros. These I like because most people I know go for known brands and ignore the premium ones. After 4 days of brutal burn in, this product simply rocks. Listen to Beethoven's Allegretto Movement of his 7th Symphony, Darshan Ambient's Sahara Sun or To the end of the World by Pat Metheny Group, and tears will well up in your eyes Try out your favourite tracks in DXD, DSD or FLAC. Keep them well and you won't regret the purchase. I also have the Master and Dynamic Mw65 for comparison. ... Simply bliss!
customer_reviews.author: LinuxProphet

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to the promise
customer_reviews.text: Active Noise Canceling is not really "canceling". While it works fine in an office environment, I used it during a long-haul flight to Mexico, and it unfortunately did not deliver. I could hear constant white noise all the time. I contacted Master and Dynamic's support about it, and they were aloof and disinterested. Now I am stuck with a lacklustre product. No firmware updates / app of course. Sound is OK but nothing amazing. Too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: deaftoned

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of MW07 and they were fantastic until the batteries started to give up. I found out they were non replaceable,so making them an expensive disposable pair of headphones. I bite the bullet and bought the MW07 Plus,WORST purchase ever!!! They are very difficult to pair and when paired, do not stay paired. My old MW07 are still paired,even after not using for a month, the new ones require pairing every time they come out the box and take numerous attempts. AVOID AVOID
customer_reviews.author: ronwoody

product_meta.title: Master & Dynamic MW07 PLUS True Wireless Earphones – noise-cancelling earphones with mic bluetooth, lightweight in-ear headphones - Black Quartz
feature_bullets: TRUE WIRELESS BLUETOOTH EARBUDS: Quick-pairing technology and a 100 ft/30 m connectivity range allow for listening on-the-go.
ACTIVE NOISE-CANCELLING EARPHONES AND AMBIENT LISTENING MODE: Enjoy your listening experience without any interruptions, focus on the sounds you want to hear.
COMFORTABLE FIT IN EAR: Silicone eartips and fit wings in various sizes allow you to custom fit these lightweight earphones.
HAND-CRAFTED DESIGN: Eye-catching acetate provides a beautiful finish in any pattern or colour.
LONG BATTERY LIFE: 10 hours of battery life with an additional 3 charges in the case, providing a total of 40 hours of playtime.

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
